sn1.51:1.1: A devatā: “What is good until old age?
sn1.51:1.3: What is the precious gem of humans?
sn1.51:1.4: What is hard for thieves to steal?”
sn1.51:2.1: The Blessed One: “Virtue is good until old age;
sn1.51:2.3: Wisdom is the precious gem of humans;
sn1.51:2.4: Merit is hard for thieves to steal. ”
